short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that identifies and translates passive aggressive email in Gmail client using Gmail.JS and NodeJS-based bundling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that identifies and translates passive aggressive phrases in emails.
Currently works only with Gmail client.
